meanings.definition: Verb: to relieve or alleviate (a person or animal) of the symptoms of a disease or condition
meanings.sent1: The medicine cures his headache quickly.
meanings.sent2: She hopes the doctor cures her cold soon.
meanings.sent3: The magical potion cures all ailments in the story.
meanings.sent4: Laughter cures the soul like a healing balm.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's power to cure any illness made him a legend.

meanings.definition: Noun: substances or treatments that restore health or well-being
meanings.sent1: Natural cures like herbs are gaining popularity.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are always searching for new cures.
meanings.sent3: The old remedy was a strange cure for hiccups.
meanings.sent4: Hope is sometimes the best cure for despair.
meanings.sent5: Music can be a cure for a troubled mind.

meanings.definition: Adjective: able to restore health or well-being
meanings.sent1: The miraculous cure treatment amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The cure properties of the plant were well-known.
meanings.sent3: The cure fountain in the park was a tourist attraction.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a cure for his bad mood.
meanings.sent5: The cure touch of her hand brought comfort.
